title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When attempting to add an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog closes immediately. Eventually, the exception list comes up, but it ignores the cancellation request.
EB: When cancelling the addition of an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog should remain open and the addition should be cancelled. The exception list should not be displayed. Additionally, the cancel button should be disabled while the addition is in progress.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the breakpoint settings.
3. Try to add an exception breakpoint.
4. During the addition process, click the cancel button.

Expected result:
The progress dialog should remain open and the addition of the exception breakpoint should be cancelled. The exception list should not be displayed.
